womens_original.title: PRIMEBLUE SST TRACK JACKET
womens_original.subtitle: womens original
womens_original.discription_head: AN ICONIC TRACK JACKET MADE WITH RECYCLED MATERIALS
womens_original.discription: A track jacket like never before. Sure, this may look just like iconic adidas gear from the archive, but this Primeblue SST Track Top symbolises change. The iconic silhouette is made with Parley Ocean Plastic that's made from upcycled plastic waste collected from ocean shores. It's a statement style that's good for the planet too. Stand up, stand out and join adidas' commitment to help end plastic waste.

mens_original.title: ADILETTE SLIDES
mens_original.subtitle: Mens Original
mens_original.discription: The Adilette debuted in 1970 as a shower slide for the German national football team during the world's biggest match in Mexico before being officially released back in '72. It's been a style mainstay of adidas ever since. These slides stay true to the original look with a contoured footbed and 3-Stripes across the bandage upper.
details: Color: Core Black / White / Core Black

mens_best.discription_head: A COMFORTABLE RUNNING TEE MADE WITH RECYCLED MATERIALS.
mens_best.discription: Every time you throw on the adidas Runner Tee and head out the door, you're signalling your commitment to yourself and to the health of the planet. The soft and comfortable t-shirt is made of recycled materials, one step adidas is making toward creating products with less environmental impact. We know it's just a first step toward a sustainable future. But that's where the journey begins.
details: This product has been made with Primegreen, a series of high-performance recycled materials using no virgin polyester.
